problem.markdown:
>>In which districts is the tested positive rate greater than the testing rate? (select one or more)<<
[x] Game District [x] Dessert District [x] Staple District [x] Bird District
[explanation] From the chart, you can see that all of these identified districts have a greated "tested positive" rate when compared to the "testing rate." This might indicate an error of some sort, as the % tested should be greater then the % positive [explanation]
>>Which district did not have any patients test positive?<<
( ) Vegetable District (x) Sweet District ( ) Dog District
[explanation] Sweet District did not have any patients test positive [explanation]
problem.p: In which districts is the tested positive rate greater than the testing rate? (select one or more)

problem.p: Which district did not have any patients test positive?

div.p: Sweet District did not have any patients test positive
